mapper.select: SELECT sk.sk_code ,st.store_info_code ,st.store_info_name ,sk.inco_code ,s.stock_code ,atc.article_code ,atc.article_name ,dtv.detailvol_remain_volume ,sk.sk_probe_volume ,sk.sk_error_volume ,s.stock_min_unit ,sk.sk_error_price_total ,sk.sk_etc ,sk.sk_date ,sk.sk_reg_date ,sk.sk_system_id ,sk.sk_system_name FROM tb_stocktaking AS sk LEFT JOIN tb_store_info AS st on sk.store_info_code = st.store_info_code LEFT JOIN tb_article AS atc on sk.article_code = atc.article_code LEFT JOIN tb_incoming AS inc on sk.inco_code = inc.inco_code LEFT JOIN tb_stock AS s on sk.stock_code = s.stock_code LEFT JOIN tb_detail_volume AS dtv on inc.inco_code = dtv.inco_code WHERE st.store_info_code= #{SSTORECODE}
